Body.One: Welcome to a community where your knowledge and expertise will help to transform the lives of disadvantaged and underprivileged individuals, refugees and asylum seekers.
Body.Two: A young nonprofit is a lot like a start-up: growing quickly and always looking for versatile people to join. Join us in one of 5 CYF cities worldwide or set up a new CYF chapter to support your local communities. We are looking for:
Body.Three: Non-technical volunteers from virtually any background to help us run and grow our organisation.
Body.Four: Professionals from the tech industry to join our mentorship programme and give a student guidance and support.
Body.Five: Experienced web developers (HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Node, React, Databases) to help teach our classes.
